name: Dergerald
description:
A small game I made in GDevelop as the first game I can say I finished, even if it was just in a day.

You play as an unnamed dragon defending a green gem from an increasing army of oncoming pudding slimes.

Press left and right to move, press down to attack, don't get eaten, it's just that simple! If you do get caught, just wait a little, you'll respawn (hopefully) before the gem gets broken.
